hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: Did you go to university? lmpanimalhealth.com Bennetts believed in the need for the Church and its members to be involved in the broader life of their communities, particularly in work of caring and social improvement. His own special concern was reconciliation, and he strongly opposed the invasion of Iraq in 2003. Preaching in Coventry Cathedral on Christmas Day, not long before the invasion, he said: “To invade Iraq would lower the threshold of what constitutes a legitimate war unjustifiably.”
